resource.chars:
for the information of the Most Noble the 
Governor in Council that on the 21 Instant,
an Eclipse of the Sun will take place, and 
that it will become <u>Total<\u> on the track of 
country extending from Tranquebar to Tellicherry.
The singular phenomena noticed at the last 
<u>Total <\u> Eclipse of the Sun, which was observed 
at <u>Turin <\u> by the Royal Astronomer of Green-
-wich rendered it desirable that the circumstances 
attending these infrequent occurrences should 
be narrowly watched; accordingly I have the 
honor to request that I may be permitted to 
proceed to Tranquebar on duty carrying 
with me such Instruments as may be 
necessary for this observation and not 
being provided with an Assistant whose 
intelligence would render his services 
valuable
